CustomField.description: Check this if you approve renaming of your username in the trial version of SalesForce.com (Sandbox). You cannot have the same username for both trial/production versions.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this if you approve renaming of your username in the trial version of SalesForce.com (Sandbox). You cannot have the same username for both trial/production versions.
CustomField.label: Do you approve renaming your username?
